title: Easy paella with chicken and prawns
directions: Cook rice according to instructions. Onion peel and chop. chorizo ​​cut into pieces. Wash peppers. Paprika and chorizo ​​cut into pieces. Halve chicken breast skirt. In skillet heat half of oil and fry chicken cooked in about 5 minutes. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper and keep warm. In casserole in remaining oil onion, chorizo ​​and peppers bake about 5 minutes. Adding garden peas and rice and fry for about 5 minutes. Add chicken and prawns and whole and by heating. Paella bring to taste with salt and pepper. Serve with tomato salad and garlic dressing.
